description: Strelka is an analysis package designed to detect somatic SNVs and small indels from the aligned sequencing reads of matched tumor-normal samples.
publications: Strelka: Accurate somatic small-variant calling from sequenced tumor-normal sample pairs.  Christopher T. Saunders; Wendy Wong; Sajani Swamy; Jennifer Becq; Lisa J. Murray; R. Keira Cheetham Bioinformatics 2012;
name: strelka
